revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #56 Jaboca |image = [[File:Jaboca.png]] |caption = The cluster of drupelets that make up this Berry pop rhythmically if the Berry is handled roughly. The sound of these Berries attracts wild Pok√©mon. |growtime = 9h 18m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 2,800 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *40 bitter *10 sour }} '''Jaboca''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of bitter on the field. The [[Durin]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-4320s || 4320-8640s || 8640-16560s || 16560-33480s || 33480-66960s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:JabocaTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:JabocaTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:JabocaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Jaboca berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[Durin]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Durin]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Durin]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Durin]] |- | || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] |- style="height: 26px;" | || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] |- | || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] |- | || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] || [[Durin]] |}
